name: Tomato Bacon Squares
author: April Phillips
summary: Swiss cheese perfectly compliments the bacon, tomatoes & bell peppers.
ingredients: ⅓ cup chopped green bell pepper
directions: Preheat oven 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Place bacon in a large skillet over medium heat
Crumble bacon into a medium-size mixing bowl
Mix in bell pepper, tomatoes, and basil
In a separate small bowl, combine mayonnaise and garlic
Roll pizza crust into a 12x15 inch rectangular baking sheet
Spread the mayonnaise mixture evenly over the crust
Sprinkle the bacon mixture over the mayonnaise, and top the entire pizza with cheese
Bake 18 to 20 minutes or until the top is bubbly and the crust is golden brown
Cool and cut the pizza into 24 squares
